Package menu

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
menu.Menu
All Implemented Interfaces:
MenuInterface
Direct Known Subclasses:
GameOverMenu, InstructionsMenu, LeaderboardMenu, PauseMenu, ShopMenu, StartMenu, VictoryMenu
public class Menu extends Object implements MenuInterface
Abstract parent class that is used to create the menu's that are used throughout the game.

      public void splitText​(String separator, int xIncr, int yIncr)
      Description copied from interface: MenuInterface
      Splits the text on the text string and adds them to the texts list. This method is used to facilitate writing long texts on the menu

      splitText in interface MenuInterface
      Parameters:

      xIncr - x coordinate increment for the text
      yIncr - y coordinate increment for the text
